document.full_text: most japanese want a new prime minister to lead the massive rebuilding needed after last month's earthquake and tsunami, newspaper polls showed on monday, as the head of government was again scolded in parliament for his handling of the disaster.
document.title: most japan voters want new pm
lines_and_colors: most japanese want a new prime minister to lead the massive rebuilding needed after last month's earthquake and tsunami, newspaper polls showed on monday, as the head of government was again scolded in parliament for his handling of the disaster.
